trans-unit.resname: CNS·1 | Advantageous Proclamation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Advantageous Proclamation
trans-unit.target: 昭告先机

trans-unit.resname: CNS·1 | Advantageous Proclamation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)
trans-unit.target: （开始游戏时将此诡局牌面朝上地置于统帅区。）

trans-unit.resname: CNS·1 | Advantageous Proclamation | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Your minimum deck size is reduced by five.
trans-unit.target: 你的套牌张数下限减少五张。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·2 | Backup Plan | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Backup Plan
trans-unit.target: 后备计划

trans-unit.resname: CNS·2 | Backup Plan | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)
trans-unit.target: （开始游戏时将此诡局牌面朝上地置于统帅区。）

trans-unit.resname: CNS·2 | Backup Plan | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw an additional hand of seven cards as the game begins. Before taking mulligans, shuffle all but one of your hands into your library.
trans-unit.target: 于游戏开始时，额外抓一份七张牌的手牌。进行再调度前，留下其中一份手牌，并将其余的洗回你的牌库。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·3 | Brago's Favor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Brago's Favor
trans-unit.target: 布莱戈的恩惠

trans-unit.resname: CNS·3 | Brago's Favor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly choose a card name. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal that name.)
trans-unit.target: 秘案（开始游戏时此诡局牌面朝下地置于统帅区，并私下决定一个牌名。你随时可以将此诡局翻回正面并公布该名称。）

trans-unit.resname: CNS·3 | Brago's Favor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Spells with the chosen name you cast cost {1} less to cast.
trans-unit.target: 由你施放且具有该名称的咒语减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·4 | Double Stroke | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Double Stroke
trans-unit.target: 双重击打

trans-unit.resname: CNS·4 | Double Stroke | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly choose a card name. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal that name.)
trans-unit.target: 秘案（开始游戏时此诡局牌面朝下地置于统帅区，并私下决定一个牌名。你随时可以将此诡局翻回正面并公布该名称。）

trans-unit.resname: CNS·4 | Double Stroke | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell with the chosen name, you may copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放一个具有该名称的瞬间或法术咒语时，你可以复制之。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·5 | Immediate Action | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Immediate Action
trans-unit.target: 事不宜迟

trans-unit.resname: CNS·5 | Immediate Action | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly choose a card name. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal that name.)
trans-unit.target: 秘案（开始游戏时此诡局牌面朝下地置于统帅区，并私下决定一个牌名。你随时可以将此诡局翻回正面并公布该名称。）

trans-unit.resname: CNS·5 | Immediate Action | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control with the chosen name have haste.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控且具有该名称的生物具有敏捷异能。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·6 | Iterative Analysis | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Iterative Analysis
trans-unit.target: 反复分析

trans-unit.resname: CNS·6 | Iterative Analysis | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly choose a card name. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal that name.)
trans-unit.target: 秘案（开始游戏时此诡局牌面朝下地置于统帅区，并私下决定一个牌名。你随时可以将此诡局翻回正面并公布该名称。）

trans-unit.resname: CNS·6 | Iterative Analysis | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell with the chosen name, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放一个具有该名称的瞬间或法术咒语时，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·7 | Muzzio's Preparations | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Muzzio's Preparations
trans-unit.target: 穆奇奥的整备

trans-unit.resname: CNS·7 | Muzzio's Preparations | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly choose a card name. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal that name.)
trans-unit.target: 秘案（开始游戏时此诡局牌面朝下地置于统帅区，并私下决定一个牌名。你随时可以将此诡局翻回正面并公布该名称。）

trans-unit.resname: CNS·7 | Muzzio's Preparations | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Each creature you control with the chosen name enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 每个由你操控且具有该名称的生物进战场时上面额外有一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·8 | Power Play | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Power Play
trans-unit.target: 权力争斗

trans-unit.resname: CNS·8 | Power Play | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)
trans-unit.target: （开始游戏时将此诡局牌面朝上地置于统帅区。）

trans-unit.resname: CNS·8 | Power Play | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: You are the starting player. If multiple players would be the starting player, one of those players is chosen at random.
trans-unit.target: 你是先手牌手。如果有多位牌手将为先手牌手，则从中随机选择一位。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·9 | Secret Summoning | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Secret Summoning
trans-unit.target: 隐秘召唤

trans-unit.resname: CNS·9 | Secret Summoning | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly choose a card name. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal that name.)
trans-unit.target: 秘案（开始游戏时此诡局牌面朝下地置于统帅区，并私下决定一个牌名。你随时可以将此诡局翻回正面并公布该名称。）

trans-unit.resname: CNS·9 | Secret Summoning | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature with the chosen name enters the battlefield under your control, you may search your library for any number of cards with that name, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个具有该名称的生物在你操控下进战场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻任意数量具有该名称的牌，展示这些牌，将它们置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·10 | Secrets of Paradise | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Secrets of Paradise
trans-unit.target: 天堂奥秘

trans-unit.resname: CNS·10 | Secrets of Paradise | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly choose a card name. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal that name.)
trans-unit.target: 秘案（开始游戏时此诡局牌面朝下地置于统帅区，并私下决定一个牌名。你随时可以将此诡局翻回正面并公布该名称。）

trans-unit.resname: CNS·10 | Secrets of Paradise | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control with the chosen name have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
trans-unit.target: 由你操控且具有该名称的生物具有「{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。」

trans-unit.resname: CNS·11 | Sentinel Dispatch | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sentinel Dispatch
trans-unit.target: 速遣哨兵

trans-unit.resname: CNS·11 | Sentinel Dispatch | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)
trans-unit.target: （开始游戏时将此诡局牌面朝上地置于统帅区。）

trans-unit.resname: CNS·11 | Sentinel Dispatch | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of the first upkeep, create a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token with defender.
trans-unit.target: 在第一个维持开始时，将一个1/1无色，具守军异能的组构体衍生神器生物放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·12 | Unexpected Potential | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Unexpected Potential
trans-unit.target: 意外潜能

trans-unit.resname: CNS·12 | Unexpected Potential | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly choose a card name. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal that name.)
trans-unit.target: 秘案（开始游戏时此诡局牌面朝下地置于统帅区，并私下决定一个牌名。你随时可以将此诡局翻回正面并公布该名称。）

trans-unit.resname: CNS·12 | Unexpected Potential | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast spells with the chosen name.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来支付施放具有该名称之咒语的费用。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·13 | Worldknit | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Worldknit
trans-unit.target: 联世妙想

trans-unit.resname: CNS·13 | Worldknit | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)
trans-unit.target: （开始游戏时将此诡局牌面朝上地置于统帅区。）

trans-unit.resname: CNS·13 | Worldknit | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As long as every card in your card pool started the game in your library or in the command zone, lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
trans-unit.target: 只要你牌池中的所有牌游戏开始时均在你的牌库或统帅区中，由你操控的地便具有「{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。」

trans-unit.resname: CNS·14 | Brago's Representative | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Brago's Representative
trans-unit.target: 布莱戈的代表

trans-unit.resname: CNS·14 | Brago's Representative | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: While voting, you get an additional vote. (The votes can be for different choices or for the same choice.)
trans-unit.target: 投票时你可以额外多投票一次。（可以投票选择不同的选项或相同的选项。）

trans-unit.resname: CNS·15 | Council Guardian | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Council Guardian
trans-unit.target: 议会守护者

trans-unit.resname: CNS·15 | Council Guardian | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Will of the council — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for blue, black, red, or green. CARDNAME gains protection from each color with the most votes or tied for most votes.
trans-unit.target: 议定～当CARDNAME进战场时，由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择「蓝色」、「黑色」、「红色」或「绿色」。CARDNAME获得票数最多或与他者同为最多的所有颜色之反色保护异能。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·16 | Council's Judgment | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Council's Judgment
trans-unit.target: 众议裁定

trans-unit.resname: CNS·16 | Council's Judgment | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Will of the council — Starting with you, each player votes for a nonland permanent you don't control. Exile each permanent with the most votes or tied for most votes.
trans-unit.target: 议定～由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择一个不由你操控的非地永久物。放逐票数最多或与他者同为最多的所有永久物。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·17 | Custodi Soulbinders | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Custodi Soulbinders
trans-unit.target: 缚灵柩护

trans-unit.resname: CNS·17 | Custodi Soulbinders | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of other creatures on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物，X为战场上其他生物的数量。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·17 | Custodi Soulbinders | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from CARDNAME: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: {2}{W}，从CARDNAME上移去一个+1/+1指示物：派出一个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·18 | Custodi Squire | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Custodi Squire
trans-unit.target: 柩护扈从

trans-unit.resname: CNS·18 | Custodi Squire | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: CNS·18 | Custodi Squire | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Will of the council — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for an artifact, creature, or enchantment card in your graveyard. Return each card with the most votes or tied for most votes to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 议定～当CARDNAME进战场时，由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择一张在你坟墓场中的神器，生物或结界牌。将所有票数最多或与他者同为最多的牌移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·19 | Rousing of Souls | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rousing of Souls
trans-unit.target: 扰醒灵魂

trans-unit.resname: CNS·19 | Rousing of Souls | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Parley — Each player reveals the top card of their library. For each nonland card revealed this way, you create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. Then each player draws a card.
trans-unit.target: 论争～每位牌手各展示其牌库顶牌。每以此法展示出一张非地牌，你便将一个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物放进战场。然后每位牌手各抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·20 | Academy Elite | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Academy Elite
trans-unit.target: 学院精英

trans-unit.resname: CNS·20 | Academy Elite | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in all graveyards.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物，X为所有坟墓场中瞬间牌和法术牌的数量加总。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·20 | Academy Elite | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}{U}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from CARDNAME: Draw a card, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: {2}{U}，从CARDNAME上移去一个+1/+1指示物：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·21 | Marchesa's Emissary | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Marchesa's Emissary
trans-unit.target: 玛切莎的密使

trans-unit.resname: CNS·21 | Marchesa's Emissary | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
trans-unit.target: 辟邪（此生物不能成为由对手所操控之咒语或异能的目标。）

trans-unit.resname: CNS·21 | Marchesa's Emissary | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 义勇（每当此生物攻击生命最多或与他者同为最多的牌手时，在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: CNS·22 | Marchesa's Infiltrator | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Marchesa's Infiltrator
trans-unit.target: 玛切莎的渗透者

trans-unit.resname: CNS·22 | Marchesa's Infiltrator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 义勇（每当此生物攻击生命最多或与他者同为最多的牌手时，在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: CNS·22 | Marchesa's Infiltrator | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·23 | Muzzio, Visionary Architect | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Muzzio, Visionary Architect
trans-unit.target: 创见构念师穆奇奥

trans-unit.resname: CNS·23 | Muzzio, Visionary Architect | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}{U}, {T}: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the highest mana value among artifacts you control. You may put an artifact card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: {3}{U}，{T}：检视你牌库顶的X张牌，X为由你操控的神器间最高之总法术力费用。你可以展示其中的一张神器牌，并将它放进战场。将其余的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·24 | Plea for Power | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Plea for Power
trans-unit.target: 祈求权力

trans-unit.resname: CNS·24 | Plea for Power | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Will of the council — Starting with you, each player votes for time or knowledge. If time gets more votes, take an extra turn after this one. If knowledge gets more votes or the vote is tied, draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: 议定～由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择「时间」或「知识」。如果时间票数较多，则在本回合后进行额外的一个回合。如果知识票数较多或两者同为最多，则抓三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·25 | Split Decision | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Split Decision
trans-unit.target: 两难决定

trans-unit.resname: CNS·25 | Split Decision | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Will of the council — Choose target instant or sorcery spell. Starting with you, each player votes for denial or duplication. If denial gets more votes, counter the spell. If duplication gets more votes or the vote is tied, copy the spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
trans-unit.target: 议定～选择目标瞬间或法术咒语。由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择「拒斥」或「重制」。如果拒斥票数较多，则反击该咒语。如果重制票数较多或两者同为最多，则复制该咒语。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·26 | Bite of the Black Rose | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bite of the Black Rose
trans-unit.target: 黑蔷薇之刺

trans-unit.resname: CNS·26 | Bite of the Black Rose | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Will of the council — Starting with you, each player votes for sickness or psychosis. If sickness gets more votes, creatures your opponents control get -2/-2 until end of turn. If psychosis gets more votes or the vote is tied, each opponent discards two cards.
trans-unit.target: 议定～由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择「染疾」或「癫狂」。如果染疾票数较多，则由对手操控的生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。如果癫狂票数较多或两者同为最多，则每位对手各弃两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·27 | Drakestown Forgotten | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Drakestown Forgotten
trans-unit.target: 垂克镇遭忘者

trans-unit.resname: CNS·27 | Drakestown Forgotten | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of creature cards in all graveyards.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物，X为所有坟墓场中生物牌的数量。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·27 | Drakestown Forgotten | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}{B}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from CARDNAME: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {2}{B}，从CARDNAME上移去一个+1/+1指示物：目标生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·28 | Grudge Keeper | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Grudge Keeper
trans-unit.target: 铭怨师

trans-unit.resname: CNS·28 | Grudge Keeper | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever players finish voting, each opponent who voted for a choice you didn't vote for loses 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当所有牌手完成投票时，每位投票选择了你未投票之选项的对手各失去2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·29 | Reign of the Pit | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Reign of the Pit
trans-unit.target: 深渊统治

trans-unit.resname: CNS·29 | Reign of the Pit | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player sacrifices a creature. Create an X/X black Demon creature token with flying, where X is the total power of the creatures sacrificed this way.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手各牺牲一个生物。你派出一个X/X黑色，具飞行异能的恶魔衍生生物，X为以此法牺牲之生物的力量总和。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·30 | Tyrant's Choice | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tyrant's Choice
trans-unit.target: 暴君抉择

trans-unit.resname: CNS·30 | Tyrant's Choice | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Will of the council — Starting with you, each player votes for death or torture. If death gets more votes, each opponent sacrifices a creature. If torture gets more votes or the vote is tied, each opponent loses 4 life.
trans-unit.target: 议定～由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择「死亡」或「折磨」。如果死亡票数较多，则每位对手各牺牲一个生物。如果折磨票数较多或两者同为最多，则每位对手各失去4点生命。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·31 | Enraged Revolutionary | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Enraged Revolutionary
trans-unit.target: 盛怒革命者

trans-unit.resname: CNS·31 | Enraged Revolutionary | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 义勇（每当此生物攻击生命最多或与他者同为最多的牌手时，在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: CNS·32 | Grenzo's Cutthroat | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Grenzo's Cutthroat
trans-unit.target: 格伦佐的割喉客

trans-unit.resname: CNS·32 | Grenzo's Cutthroat | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: First strike
trans-unit.target: 先攻

trans-unit.resname: CNS·32 | Grenzo's Cutthroat | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 义勇（每当此生物攻击生命最多或与他者同为最多的牌手时，在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: CNS·33 | Grenzo's Rebuttal | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Grenzo's Rebuttal
trans-unit.target: 格伦佐的抗辩

trans-unit.resname: CNS·33 | Grenzo's Rebuttal | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create a 4/4 red Ogre creature token. Starting with you, each player chooses an artifact, a creature, and a land from among the permanents controlled by the player to their left. Destroy each permanent chosen this way.
trans-unit.target: 将一个4/4红色食人魔衍生生物放进战场。由你开始，每位牌手各从由其左手边牌手操控的永久物之中选择一个神器、一个生物和一个地。消灭所有该些永久物。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·34 | Ignition Team | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ignition Team
trans-unit.target: 纵火队

trans-unit.resname: CNS·34 | Ignition Team | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of tapped lands on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物，X为战场上已横置之地的数量。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·34 | Ignition Team | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}{R}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from CARDNAME: Target land becomes a 4/4 red Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
trans-unit.target: {2}{R}，从CARDNAME上移去一个+1/+1指示物：目标地成为4/4红色元素生物直到回合结束。它仍然是地。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·35 | Scourge of the Throne | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 义勇（每当此生物攻击生命最多或与他者同为最多的牌手时，在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: CNS·35 | Scourge of the Throne | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks for the first time each turn, if it's attacking the player with the most life or tied for most life, untap all attacking creatures. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME每回合首度攻击时，若其正向生命最多或与他者同为最多的牌手进行攻击，则重置所有进行攻击的生物。在此阶段后，额外多出一个战斗阶段。

trans-unit.target: 背信食人魔

trans-unit.source: Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 义勇（每当此生物攻击生命最多或与他者同为最多的牌手时，在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: CNS·36 | Treasonous Ogre | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Pay 3 life: Add {R}.

trans-unit.resname: CNS·37 | Predator's Howl | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Morbid — Create three 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens instead if a creature died this turn.
trans-unit.target: 丧心～如果本回合中有生物死去，则改为派出三个2/2绿色的狼衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·38 | Realm Seekers | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: CNS·38 | Realm Seekers | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the total number of cards in all players' hands.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物，X为所有牌手手牌的总数。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·38 | Realm Seekers | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from CARDNAME: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: CNS·39 | Selvala's Charge | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Parley — Each player reveals the top card of their library. For each nonland card revealed this way, you create a 3/3 green Elephant creature token. Then each player draws a card.
trans-unit.target: 论争～每位牌手各展示其牌库顶牌。每以此法展示出一张非地牌，你便将一个3/3绿色的象衍生生物放进战场。然后每位牌手各抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·40 | Selvala's Enforcer | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: CNS·40 | Selvala's Enforcer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Parley — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, each player reveals the top card of their library. For each nonland card revealed this way, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME. Then each player draws a card.
trans-unit.target: 论争～当CARDNAME进战场时，每位牌手各展示其牌库顶牌。每以此法展示出一张非地牌，便在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。然后每位牌手各抓一张牌。

trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: CNS·41 | Brago, King Eternal | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, exile any number of target nonland permanents you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，放逐任意数量目标由你操控的非地永久物，然后将这些牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.source: [+1]: Target player draws two cards, then discards two cards.

trans-unit.resname: CNS·42 | Dack Fayden | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [−2]: Gain control of target artifact.
trans-unit.target: −2：获得目标神器的操控权。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·42 | Dack Fayden | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−6]: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell that targets one or more permanents, gain control of those permanents."
trans-unit.target: −6：你获得具有「每当你施放以一个或数个永久物为目标的咒语时，获得这些永久物的操控权」的徽记。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·43 | Dack's Duplicate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dack's Duplicate
trans-unit.target: 戴克的拟形妖

trans-unit.resname: CNS·43 | Dack's Duplicate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may have CARDNAME enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it has haste and dethrone. (Whenever it attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 你可以使CARDNAME当成战场上任一生物的复制品来进入战场，但它具有敏捷与义勇异能。（每当它攻击生命最多或与他者同为最多的牌手时，在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.source: Morbid — At the beginning of each end step, if a creature died this turn, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 丧心～在每个结束步骤开始时，若本回合中有生物死去，则你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·45 | Extract from Darkness | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 黯域掘力

trans-unit.resname: CNS·45 | Extract from Darkness | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player mills two cards. Then you put a creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手各磨两张牌。然后你将一张生物牌在你的操控下从坟墓场放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·46 | Flamewright | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice a creature with defender: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲一个具守军异能的生物：CARDNAME对目标生物或牌手造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·47 | Grenzo, Dungeon Warden | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}: Put the bottom card of your library into your graveyard. If it's a creature card with power less than or equal to Grenzo's power, put it onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: {2}：将你的牌库底牌置入你的坟墓场。如果它是生物牌，且其力量等于或小于格伦佐的力量，则将之放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·48 | Magister of Worth | Card Name

trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: CNS·48 | Magister of Worth | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Will of the council — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for grace or condemnation. If grace gets more votes, each player returns each creature card from their graveyard to the battlefield. If condemnation gets more votes or the vote is tied, destroy all creatures other than CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 议定～当CARDNAME进战场时，由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择「恩典」或「定罪」。若恩典票数较多，则每位牌手各将其坟墓场中所有生物牌移回战场。若定罪票数较多或两者同为最多，则消灭CARDNAME以外的所有生物。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·49 | Marchesa, the Black Rose | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 黑蔷薇玛切莎

trans-unit.source: Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 义勇（每当此生物攻击生命最多或与他者同为最多的牌手时，在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: CNS·49 | Marchesa, the Black Rose | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Other creatures you control have dethrone.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他生物具有义勇异能。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·49 | Marchesa, the Black Rose | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控且其上有+1/+1指示物的生物死去，在下一个结束步骤开始时将该牌在你的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·50 | Marchesa's Smuggler | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}{U}{R}: Target creature you control gains haste until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.
trans-unit.target: {1}{U}{R}：目标由你操控的生物获得敏捷异能直到回合结束，且本回合不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: Parley — {T}: Each player reveals the top card of their library. For each nonland card revealed this way, add {G} and you gain 1 life. Then each player draws a card.
trans-unit.target: 论争～{T}：每位牌手各展示其牌库顶牌。每以此法展示出一张非地牌，你便加{G}且获得1点生命。然后每位牌手各抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·52 | Woodvine Elemental | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 践踏

trans-unit.resname: CNS·52 | Woodvine Elemental | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Parley — Whenever CARDNAME attacks, each player reveals the top card of their library. For each nonland card revealed this way, attacking creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Then each player draws a card.
trans-unit.target: 论争～每当CARDNAME攻击时，每位牌手各展示其牌库顶牌。每以此法展示出一张非地牌，由你操控且进行攻击的生物便得+1/+1直到回合结束。然后每位牌手各抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·53 | Aether Searcher | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Aether Searcher
trans-unit.target: 乙太探寻客

trans-unit.resname: CNS·53 | Aether Searcher | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reveal CARDNAME as you draft it. Reveal the next card you draft and note its name.
trans-unit.target: 于你抽选CARDNAME时展示之。展示你抽选的下一张牌并记下其名称。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·53 | Aether Searcher | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your hand and/or library for a card with a name noted as you drafted cards named CARDNAME. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. If you searched your library this way, shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你手上和／或牌库中搜寻一张牌，其名称须为你于抽选名称为CARDNAME之牌时记下的各名称之一。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。如果你以此法搜寻了你的牌库，则将它洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·54 | Agent of Acquisitions | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Agent of Acquisitions
trans-unit.target: 征收密探

trans-unit.resname: CNS·54 | Agent of Acquisitions | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draft CARDNAME face up.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME以牌面朝上的方式进行轮抽。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·54 | Agent of Acquisitions | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Instead of drafting a card from a booster pack, you may draft each card in that booster pack, one at a time. If you do, turn CARDNAME face down and you can't draft cards for the rest of this draft round. (You may look at booster packs passed to you.)
trans-unit.target: 你于抽选某包补充包中的牌时，可以改为一次一张地抽选该包补充包中的所有牌，而非只抽选其中一张牌。如果你如此作，则将CARDNAME翻为牌面朝下，且你在本轮抽圈次余下时段不能抽选牌。（你可以检视传给你的补充包。）

trans-unit.resname: CNS·55 | Canal Dredger | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Canal Dredger
trans-unit.target: 运河疏浚械

trans-unit.resname: CNS·55 | Canal Dredger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draft CARDNAME face up.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME以牌面朝上的方式进行轮抽。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·55 | Canal Dredger | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Each player passes the last card from each booster pack to a player who drafted a card named CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手将每包补充包中的最后一张牌传给抽选了名称为CARDNAME之牌的任一牌手。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·55 | Canal Dredger | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {T}: Put target card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library.
trans-unit.target: {T}：将目标牌从你坟墓场置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·56 | Coercive Portal | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Coercive Portal
trans-unit.target: 胁迫通道

trans-unit.resname: CNS·56 | Coercive Portal | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Will of the council — At the beginning of your upkeep, starting with you, each player votes for carnage or homage. If carnage gets more votes, sacrifice CARDNAME and destroy all nonland permanents. If homage gets more votes or the vote is tied, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 议定～在你的维持开始时，由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择「杀戮」或「俸禄」。若杀戮票数较多，则牺牲CARDNAME并消灭所有非地永久物。若俸禄票数较多或两者同为最多，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·57 | Cogwork Grinder | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 齿轮碾磨兽

trans-unit.resname: CNS·57 | Cogwork Grinder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draft CARDNAME face up.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME以牌面朝上的方式进行轮抽。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·57 | Cogwork Grinder | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As you draft a card, you may remove it from the draft face down. (Those cards aren't in your card pool.)
trans-unit.target: 于你抽选牌时，你可以将该牌面朝下地移出轮抽。（该些牌不属于你的牌池。）

trans-unit.resname: CNS·57 | Cogwork Grinder | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of cards you removed from the draft with cards named CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物，X为你以名称为CARDNAME的牌移出轮抽之所有牌的数量。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·58 | Cogwork Librarian | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As you draft a card, you may draft an additional card from that booster pack. If you do, put CARDNAME into that booster pack.
trans-unit.target: 于你抽选牌时，你可以从该补充包中额外抽选一张牌。如果你如此作，则将CARDNAME置于该补充包中。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·60 | Cogwork Tracker | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME以牌面朝上的方式进行轮抽。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·61 | Deal Broker | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Immediately after the draft, you may reveal a card in your card pool. Each other player may offer you one card in their card pool in exchange. You may accept any one offer.
trans-unit.target: 于轮抽结束的同时，你可以展示你牌池中的一张牌。每位其他牌手均可以用其牌池中的任一张牌提议与该牌交换。你可以接受任一项提议。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·61 | Deal Broker | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·62 | Lore Seeker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lore Seeker
trans-unit.target: 觅识械

trans-unit.resname: CNS·62 | Lore Seeker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reveal CARDNAME as you draft it. After you draft CARDNAME, you may add a booster pack to the draft. (Your next pick is from that booster pack. Pass it to the next player and it's drafted this draft round.)
trans-unit.target: 于你抽选CARDNAME时展示之。你抽选CARDNAME之后，你可以将一包补充包加入轮抽。（你的下一次选牌将从该补充包中抽选。将其传给下一位牌手，该补充包会在本轮抽圈次中进行轮抽。）

trans-unit.resname: CNS·63 | Lurking Automaton | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lurking Automaton
trans-unit.target: 伏击机械兽

trans-unit.resname: CNS·63 | Lurking Automaton | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reveal CARDNAME as you draft it and note how many cards you've drafted this draft round, including CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 于你抽选CARDNAME时展示之，并记下本轮抽圈次中包括CARDNAME在内你已抽选的牌数。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·63 | Lurking Automaton | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the highest number you noted for cards named CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物，X为你替名称为CARDNAME之牌记下的各数字间之最大值。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·64 | Whispergear Sneak | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Whispergear Sneak
trans-unit.target: 嗫语窥械

trans-unit.resname: CNS·64 | Whispergear Sneak | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draft CARDNAME face up.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME以牌面朝上的方式进行轮抽。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·64 | Whispergear Sneak | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: During the draft, you may turn CARDNAME face down. If you do, look at any unopened booster pack in the draft or any booster pack not being looked at by another player.
trans-unit.target: 于轮抽中，你可以将CARDNAME翻为牌面朝下。如果你如此作，则检视本轮抽中任意一包未打开的补充包或任意一包其他牌手目前并未检视的补充包。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·65 | Paliano, the High City | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Paliano, the High City
trans-unit.target: 上城帕兰诺

trans-unit.resname: CNS·65 | Paliano, the High City | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reveal CARDNAME as you draft it. The player to your right chooses a color, you choose another color, then the player to your left chooses a third color.
trans-unit.target: 于你抽选CARDNAME时展示之。你右手边的牌手选择一种颜色，你选择另一种颜色，然后你左手边的牌手再选择另外一种颜色。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·65 | Paliano, the High City | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color chosen as you drafted cards named CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点法术力到你的法术力池中，其颜色为于你抽选名称为CARDNAME之牌时被选中的各颜色之一。
